<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>latest_reject_reason</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {

   var reason = '';

  try {
    if (current && current.getTableName && current.getTableName() == 'sysapproval_approver') {
      if (current.getValue('state') == 'rejected')
        reason = current.comments.getJournalEntry(1) || '';
    } else if (current) {
      var appr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
      appr.addQuery('document_id', current.getUniqueValue());
      appr.addQuery('state', 'rejected');
      appr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
      appr.setLimit(1);
      appr.query();
      if (appr.next())
        reason = appr.comments.getJournalEntry(1) || '';
    }
  } catch (e) {}

  // als Variable für den Body bereitstellen
  template.variables.put('reject_reason', reason);

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 15:58:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>a6eaad109324325005087efdfaba10ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>latest_reject_reason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowRoom" source="x_1782765_nowroom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowRoom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_a6eaad109324325005087efdfaba10ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 15:58:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
